reference.shortdesc: A source is a resource from which the present topic is derived, either completely or in part.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The source element contains a description of the resource. Alternatively, the href or keyref attributes can be used to reference a description of the resource.

section.title: Processing expectations
section.p: It is undefined what it means when the source element has both content and an attribute-based reference to another resource. It is up to the implementation to determine the processing for this situation.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , , and keyref.
For this element, the href attribute provides a reference to a resource from which the topic is derived.
